flawed_nl_solution:
Andy weighed 156 + 36 = <<156+36=129>>129 pounds after growing taller.
An eighth of his weight is 1/8 x 129 = <<1/8*129=129/8>>129/8 pounds.
Over the next 3 months, Andy lost 129/8 x 3 = <<129/8*3=387/8>>387/8 pounds.
He now weighs 129 - 387/8 = <<129-387/8=645/8>>645/8 pounds.
Andy weighs 156 - 645/8 = <<156-645/8=603/8>>603/8 pounds less than at the beginning of the year.
#### 603/8

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 192, not 129. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
